## A year-long initiative as a data analytics intern

University of California, Riverside

A year-long project consisting of:

-   Gathering data from academic learning tool vendors

-   Cleaning, preparing, and organizing data into a database

-   Analyzing and presenting the analysis in a data reporting tool through dashboards

-   Disseminating the insights and key metrics to supervisors and stakeholders
